medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began in the afternoon prior to presentation. The patient's wife noted he had been fatigued with decreased appetite and weakness upon standing, now walking with a shuffling gait. He also reported a new episode of urinary incontinence on the morning of presentation. Along with these symptoms, he experienced new right-sided rib and right upper abdominal pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, Paroxysmal atrial fibrillation, History of left basal ganglia infarct, History of gout, History of prostate cancer, History of colon adenoma, History of shoulder pain, History of bilateral cataracts.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had hypertension; Uncle had coronary artery disease; Father's history unknown.
